verses.name: Psalms 114:1
verses.text: When Israel went out of Egypt, the house of Jacob from a people of strange language;

verses.name: Psalms 114:2
verses.text: Judah was his sanctuary, and Israel his dominion.

verses.name: Psalms 114:3
verses.text: The sea saw it, and fled: Jordan was driven back.

verses.name: Psalms 114:4
verses.text: The mountains skipped like rams, and the little hills like lambs.

verses.name: Psalms 114:5
verses.text: What ailed thee, O thou sea, that thou fleddest? thou Jordan, that thou wast driven back?

verses.name: Psalms 114:6
verses.text: Ye mountains, that ye skipped like rams; and ye little hills, like lambs?

verses.name: Psalms 114:7
verses.text: Tremble, thou earth, at the presence of the Lord, at the presence of the God of Jacob;
